p:
To determine LOD and LOQ, five different concentrations (25, 50, 100, 200, and 300 μg/mL of MeJA) were prepared by diluting the sample solution of MeJA-MRC with mobile phase and subsequently injected into the HPLC system. The LOD and LOQ were then calculated by the following formulas as described elsewhere [24].
(1)LOD= 3.3 σ/S
(2)LOQ= 10 σ/S where, σ and S are the intercept and slope of the calibration curve, respectively.
